Author: lightbulbbrian
Text: I've heard that the dark circles under your eyes are a low carb thing, people in keto get them too, and I think the moodiness is like low blood sugar, that always gets me lol

Author: algorthin
Text: Your ability to emotionally regulate is inhibited when you're malnourished. When you're not trying to recover, a lot of this can just become numbness, and you're still not emotionally regulating but you're not feeling either. It's not like, "some sort of weird link," it's because you're starving and your brain doesn't work correctly when you don't have fuel for it. When you recover and start feeding yourself again, a lot of this will fix itself because your brain can do its job, but treatment programs also include emotional regulation because it's something that a lot of people with eating disorders do struggle with.
